Share:
1. ?
2. You may include a share of Aqeeqa for your child and your late
father-in-law in the cow.
3. The purpose of including a share for Rasulullah (Sallallaahu Alayhi
Wasallam) is Isaal-e-Sawaab (passing the reward) to him. By that, it is
hoped the sacrifice will be accepted by Allah Ta'ala with greater honour and
yielding greater rewards from Allah. That will also make Rasulullah
(Sallallaahu Alayhi Wasallam) happy, Insha Allah.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best
